problem_text_cn: 如图,一架梯子斜靠在墙上,梯子与地面的夹角∠ABC=60°,梯子的长为5米,则梯子与墙角的距离BC为()米．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a ladder leans against the wall, the angle between the ladder and the ground is ∠ABC = N_0, the length of the ladder is N_1, then the distance BC between the ladder and the corner of the wall is ().
